front.title: SS7 MTP2-User Peer-to-Peer Adaptation Layer Test Specifications M2PA-TEST

abstract.t: This Internet Draft provides information for the Internet community on test cases for testing the SS7 MTP2-User Peer-to-Peer Adaptation Layer [M2PA] based on the conformance test specifications for SS7 MTP Level 2 [Q.781]. This memo describes the test environment and a detailed description of test cases for validation, compatibility and interoperability testing of the M2PA protocol implemented on the foundation of ITU SS7 MTP Signalling Links [Q.703].
